entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to 1000 metres this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
